actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs, Alcohol.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Children, Family, Drugs and Alcoholism

official_title: A bill to establish demonstration projects to provide direct services to homeless youth, and for other purposes.
short_title: Homeless Youth Demonstration Project Act of 1990

summary.text: Homeless Youth Demonstration Project Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish up to three demonstration projects to provide a network of comprehensive services for homeless youth. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Homeless Youth Demonstration Project Act of 1990
A bill to establish demonstration projects to provide direct services to homeless youth, and for other purposes.
